TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit OracleBoolean extends System.ValueType implements class System.IComparable

Docs.summary: Represents the value returned from a database comparison operation between Oracle data types, and exposes methods used to perform data type conversions.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The key difference between an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure and a standard **Boolean** value is that, where a standard `Boolean` has two possible values, `true` and `false`, an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure has three possible values, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False>, or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>.
An <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure does not map to an Oracle `Boolean` data type; it is exposed as a convenience support class.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the structure.

A positive integer

remarks.format: ## Remarks Any instance of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean>, regardless of its value, is considered greater than a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
